help.description: Sets whether multiple people can guess a song correctly. When {{on}}, players will have 1.5 seconds after the first correct answer is given, to continue to answer. The first answer receives full EXP, correct answers that come after receive multiplicatively less EXP.

example.off: Only the first person who guesses correct is awarded the point
example.on: Allows for a 1.5 second grace period from when the first correct guess occurs. Multiple players are able to guess correctly

interaction.description: Sets whether multiple people can guess a song correctly

help.description: Starts a game of KMQ.

example.classic: Start a classic game of KMQ (type in your guess first to get a point)
example.clip: Guess the song based on a repeated snippet, played for {{clipDuration}} seconds
example.elimination: Start an elimination game of KMQ where each player starts with {{lives}} lives
example.hidden: Start a hidden game of KMQ, where players can only answer with /guess
example.suddenDeath: Start a sudden death game of KMQ, where someone has to get the song right, or the game ends
example.teams: Split up into as many teams as you want and see who you can depend on to help you win!

interaction.clipDuration: Choose how long each clip will play for
interaction.lives: Choose how many lives each player starts with
interaction.newClip: Choose whether a new clip is played each time, instead of repeating the same clip

exported.description:
Import {{presetName}} as a new preset in other servers using:
{{presetImport}} `exported_preset:{{presetUUID}} new_preset_name:[preset_name]`

Alternatively, load the preset's options directly using:
{{presetLoad}} `preset_name:{{presetUUID}}`
exported.title: Preset Exported

alreadyExists.description: Preset {{presetNameFormatted}} already exists. You can delete the old one with {{presetDelete}} `preset_name:{{presetName}}`.
alreadyExists.title: Preset Already Exists

lengthyName.description: Preset name must be at most {{presetNameMaxLength}} characters.
lengthyName.title: Preset Name Too Long

missingIdentifier.description: You must specify a preset identifier. Use {{presetExport}} `preset_name:[preset_name]` to retrieve a preset's identifier.
missingIdentifier.title: Preset Identifier Missing

missingName.description: You must specify a preset name.
missingName.title: Preset Name Missing

tooMany.description: Each guild may only have up to {{maxNumPresets}} presets. Please delete some before adding more.
tooMany.title: Too Many Presets

help.description: Various actions to save/load game option presets. Preset name must be one word long.

example.export: Returns a unique identifier that can be used to load/import the mentioned preset
example.import: Creates a new preset using an exported preset identifier
example.list: Lists all of the server's presets
example.load: Loads the mentioned preset or preset identifier ({{exampleIdentifier}}) into the game options
example.replace: Replace the mentioned preset's options with the current game options
example.save: Saves the current game options as a preset

help.name: preset

vote.description:
Vote for KMQ on [top.gg]({{voteLink}}) and you'll receive 2x EXP for an hour! You can vote once every {{voteResetDuration}} hours.

We'd appreciate it if you could also leave a [review]({{reviewLink}}).

help.description: Shows instructions on how to vote to receive 2x EXP for an hour.
help.name: vote

fun.bigThreeDominance: Fun Fact: BTS, Blackpink and Twice combined account for {{bigThreeViews}} YouTube views, or {{proportion}}%!
fun.birthday: Fun Fact: {{name}}'s birthday is this month on {{formattedDate}}!
fun.companyByArtistCount: Fun Fact: {{company}} is the entertainment company with the {{ordinalNum}} most artists (including subunits and solo debuts) at {{num}} total!
fun.companyByArtistViews: Fun Fact: {{name}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most viewed entertainment company with {{views}} total YouTube views!
fun.historicalCircleDigitalWeekly: Fun Fact: On this week in {{year}}, {{songName}} was the top charting song on the Circle Digital Weekly charts!
fun.mostActiveYear: Fun Fact: {{year}} was the {{ordinalNum}} most active year in K-Pop with {{num}} music video releases!
fun.mostAnnualAwardShowWins: Fun Fact: {{artistName}} has the {{ordinalNum}} most annual award show wins with {{wins}}!
fun.mostCircleDigitalAppearances: Fun Fact: {{artistName}} has placed on the Circle Digital weekly charts the {{ordinalNum}} most times with {{appearances}} appearances!
fun.mostCircleDigitalFirsts: Fun Fact: {{artistName}} has topped the Circle Digital weekly charts the {{ordinalNum}} most times with {{firstPlaceCount}} first place appearances!
fun.mostDebuts: Fun Fact: {{year}} had the {{ordinalNum}} most debuts with {{num}} groups debuting!
fun.mostLikedGroup: Fun Fact: {{artist}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most liked group with {{likes}} total YouTube likes!
fun.mostLikedVideo: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most liked video with {{likes}} total YouTube likes!
fun.mostMVs: Fun Fact: {{artist}} has the {{ordinalNum}} most music videos with {{num}} on YouTube!
fun.mostMusicShowWins: Fun Fact: {{artist}} has won the {{ordinalNum}} most music shows with {{num}} wins!
fun.mostViewedGroup: Fun Fact: {{artist}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most viewed group with {{views}} total YouTube views!
fun.mostViewedSoloist: Fun Fact: {{artist}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most viewed solo artist with {{views}} total YouTube views!
fun.mostViewedVideo: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most viewed video with {{views}} total YouTube views!
fun.mvViewMilestone: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} recently reached {{views}} views on YouTube!
fun.newMV: New Song Alert: Check out this recently released music video, {{hyperlink}}
fun.oldMV: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} was released this week back in {{year}}!
fun.recentCircleDigitalWeekly: Fun Fact: {{songName}} is the {{ordinalNum}} highest charting song on the Circle Digital Weekly charts last week!
fun.recentMusicShowWin: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} recently won on {{musicShow}} on {{winDate}}
fun.recentPak: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most recent music video to receive a PAK (Perfect All-Kill)!
fun.upcomingReleases: Fun Fact: '{{releaseName}}' ({{releaseType}}) by '{{artistName}}' is releasing soon on {{dateString}}!
fun.viewsByArtistType: Fun Fact: There is a combined total of {{totalViews}} views on all K-Pop music videos on YouTube, {{groupViews}} ({{groupProportion}}%) of which are from groups, while {{soloViews}} ({{soloProportion}}%) are from solo artists.
fun.viewsByGender: Fun Fact: There is a combined total of {{totalViews}} views on all K-Pop music videos on YouTube, {{maleViews}} ({{maleProportion}}%) of which are from male groups, {{femaleViews}} ({{femaleProportion}}%) from female groups, and the remaining {{coedViews}} ({{coedProportion}}%) from co-ed groups.

kmq.guessRate: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} has a guess rate of {{percentage}}% over {{roundsPlayed}} rounds played
kmq.highestLeveledPlayerStats: Fun Fact: The {{ordinalNum}} highest leveled KMQ player is Level {{level}}, with {{songsGuessed}} songs guessed over {{gamesPlayed}} games!
kmq.longestGame: KMQ Fact: The world's (current) longest game of KMQ lasted {{sessionLength}} minutes, with {{roundsPlayed}} songs played, an average guess time of {{avgGuessTime}} seconds, with {{numParticipants}} participants! Can you beat that?
kmq.mostActivePlayerGamesPlayed: KMQ Fact: The most active player has played {{gamesPlayed}} games since Nov 8th, 2020!
kmq.mostActivePlayerSongsGuessed: KMQ Fact: The most active player has guessed {{songsGuessed}} songs since Nov 8th, 2020!
kmq.mostActiveServer: KMQ Fact: The most active server has played {{gamesPlayed}} games of KMQ, with a total of {{songsGuessed}} songs guessed!
kmq.mostCorrectGuessesServer: KMQ Fact: The server with the most correct guesses has played {{gamesPlayed}} games of KMQ, with a total of {{songsGuessed}} songs guessed!
kmq.recentRounds: KMQ Fact: There has been a total of {{recentGameCount}} rounds of KMQ have been played in the last week!
kmq.recentSessions: KMQ Fact: A total of {{recentSessions}} games of KMQ have been played in the last week!
kmq.totalGames: KMQ Fact: A grand total of {{totalGamesPlayed}} games of KMQ have been played!
kmq.uniquePlayers: KMQ Fact: {{recentActivePlayers}} unique players have played KMQ in the past {{xDays}}!

afkChannel.description: Ensure you're not in the inactive voice channel so that you can hear me!
afkChannel.title: AFK Voice Channel

command.title: Error Running Command

deprecatedTextCommand.description: Text commands are no longer supported for new commands. Try out the new and improved slash commands instead! If slash commands are not visible in the server, please re-invite KMQ to the server.
deprecatedTextCommand.title: Text Commands Deprecated

errorSelectingSong.description: Please try starting the round again. If the issue persists, report it in our official KMQ server.
errorSelectingSong.title: Error Selecting Song

noneInProgress.description: There is no game in progress.
noneInProgress.title: No Active Game

gameOptionConflict.description: {{optionOne}} game option is currently set. {{optionTwo}} and {{optionOne}} are incompatible. Remove the {{optionOne}} option by typing {{optionOneCommand}} to proceed.
gameOptionConflict.title: Game Option Conflict

groupsExcludeConflict.description:
One or more of the given {{conflictingOptionOne}} is already included in {{conflictingOptionTwo}}. 
The following groups were **not** added to {{conflictingOptionOne}}:
 {{groupsList}}
Use {{solutionStepOne}} and then {{solutionStepTwo}} {{allowOrPrevent}}.
groupsExcludeConflict.title: Groups and Exclude Conflict

interaction.alreadyEliminated: You've already been eliminated this round.
interaction.bookmarkOutsideGame: You can only bookmark songs during a game.
interaction.guildBanned: This server is banned from using KMQ. For appeals, contact the official KMQ support server at {{supportServer}}.
interaction.guildOnly: KMQ can only be used in servers.
interaction.invalidBookmark: You can only bookmark songs recently played in the last {{BOOKMARK_MESSAGE_SIZE}} rounds. You must bookmark the message sent by the bot containing the song.
interaction.optionFromPreviousRound: You are attempting to pick an option from an already completed round.
interaction.playerBanned: You are banned from using KMQ. For appeals, contact the official KMQ support server at {{supportServer}}.

maintenanceMode.description: KMQ is currently under maintenance. Check back later!
maintenanceMode.title: Maintenance Mode

failure.messageTooLong: Response message was too long, report this error to the KMQ help server

missingPermissions.description: Hi! I'm unable to message in the {{channelName}} channel. Please make sure the bot has permissions to message in this channel. See the following link for details: {{permissionsLink}}.
missingPermissions.title: Missing Permissions

failure.missingPermissionsText:
Ensure that the bot has the following permissions: {{missingPermissions}}

See the following link for details: {{permissionsLink}}. If you are still having issues, join the official KMQ server found in {{helpCommand}}

notInVC.description: Send {{command}} again when you are in a voice channel.
notInVC.title: Join a Voice Channel

optionsGeneration.description:
Failed sending options to the channel. Use {{resetCommand}} and try again. If the issue persists, report it in the official KMQ server found in {{helpCommand}} and provide the following ID to a developer:
{{debugId}}
optionsGeneration.title: Error Sending Options

retrievingSongData.description: Try again in a bit, or report this error to the official KMQ server found in {{helpCommand}}.
retrievingSongData.title: Error Retrieving Song Data

noneInProgress.description: Current round has ended! Wait for the next round to begin.
noneInProgress.title: Round Finished

songQuery.description: Failed to find songs matching this criteria. Try to broaden your search.
songQuery.title: Song Query Error

unrecognizedGroups.solution: Use {{command}} to add the unmatched groups.
unrecognizedGroups.title: Unknown Group Name

enum.notInEnum: Expected one of the following valid {{argument}} values: ({{validValues}}).

numArguments.incorrect: Incorrect number of arguments. See {{help}} action:{{command}} for usage.

number.max: Expected value less than or equal to {{max}} for {{argument}}
number.min: Expected value greater than or equal to {{min}} for {{argument}}.

vcFull.description: Ensure that there's enough room in the voice channel for me to join.
vcFull.title: Voice Channel Full

vcJoin.description: Something went wrong, try starting the game again in a bit.
vcJoin.title: Error Joining Voice Channel

gameOwnerChanged.description: The new game owner is {{newGameOwner}}. They are in charge of {{forcehintCommand}} and {{forceskipCommand}}.
gameOwnerChanged.title: Game Owner Changed

bookmarked.description: You'll receive a direct message with a link to '{{songName}}' at the end of the game.
bookmarked.title: Song Bookmarked

profile.inaccessible: I can't access that user right now. Try using {{profileUserID}} instead.
profile.noStats: This user needs to play their first game before their stats are tracked.

preCheck.competition: This command has been disabled for regular users in the competition.
preCheck.differentVC: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot to use this command.
preCheck.notClipMode: You can't do that while in clip mode.
preCheck.notGameSession: You can't do that while in a game session.
preCheck.notHidden: You can't do that during a hidden round.
preCheck.notListeningSession: You can't do that while in a listening session.
preCheck.notPlaylist: You can't change that option when playing from a playlist. Use {{playlistResetCommand}} before changing this option.
preCheck.notSuddenDeath: You can't do that during sudden death.
preCheck.title: Wait...

restart.description_hard: Downtime will be approximately a few seconds. Please end the current game to ensure your progress is saved!
restart.title: Upcoming Restart in {{timeUntilRestart}} Minutes.

uniqueSongsReset.description: All songs have been played. {{totalSongCount}} songs will be reshuffled.
uniqueSongsReset.title: Resetting Unique Songs
